ModMetaData.name: [HH] Smokeleaf Lite
ModMetaData.author: HohenHeizen
ModMetaData.description: A mod aimed at changing smokeleaf to be less deadly, and less stereotypical, while also adding a small production chain. --- Contains: Smokeleaf Changes: • Getting high now effects Talking, Manipulation, and Moving instead of Conciousness • The High Effect now had 3 Stages. (buzzed, high, stoned) New Hediff: • Pneumonitis: (inflamamtion of lungs) Replaces Asthma as primary effect Asthma replaces Carcinoma New Recipes: • Make Hempen Cloth Requires: Crafting Spot, Tailoring Bench, Electric Taloring Bench • Make Herbal Medicine from Smokeleaf Requires: Crafting Spot, Drug Lab (no research required) Recipe: 4xSmokeleaf leaves, 3xCloth • Make Hash from Smokeleaf Requires: Drug Lab (smokeleaf refining) Recipe: 42xSmokeleaf leaves • Make Chemfuel from Smokeleaf Requires: Biofuel rifinery (smokeleaf refining) Recipe: 70 xmokeleaf Leaves (removed smokeleaf from organics fuel) New Research: Smokeleaf Refining Requires: 400 Research Version 1.0.0
